sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import { useCart } from '../context/CartContext'; const Cart = () => { const { items: cartItems, updateQuantity, removeItem, getCartTotal, clearCart } = useCart(); const subtotal = getCartTotal(); const shipping = subtotal > 100 ? 0 : 15; const tax = subtotal * 0.08; // 8% tax const total = subtotal + shipping + tax; if (cartItems.length === 0) { return (

Your cart is empty

Looks like you haven't added any items to your cart yet.

Start Shopping
); } return (
{/* Page Header */}

Shopping Cart

{cartItems.length} items in your cart

{/* Cart Items */}
{cartItems.map((item, index) => (
{/* Product Image */}
{item.name}
{/* Product Details */}
{item.name}

{item.category}

Size: {item.size} Color: {item.color}

${item.price}

{/* Quantity Controls */}
{item.quantity}
{/* Remove Button */}
{/* Item Total */}

Subtotal: ${(item.price * item.quantity).toFixed(2)}

))}
{/* Continue Shopping */}
Continue Shopping
{/* Order Summary */}

Order Summary

Subtotal ({cartItems.length} items) ${subtotal.toFixed(2)}
Shipping {shipping === 0 ? 'FREE' : `$${shipping.toFixed(2)}`}
Tax ${tax.toFixed(2)}
{shipping === 0 && subtotal < 100 && (
ðŸŽ‰ You qualify for free shipping!
)} {shipping > 0 && (
Add ${(100 - subtotal).toFixed(2)} more for free shipping
)}
Total ${total.toFixed(2)}
{/* Promo Code */}
{/* Checkout Button */} Proceed to Checkout {/* Security Info */}
Secure Checkout

Your payment information is encrypted and secure

); }; export default Cart;
